summary: Changes Miraak's Gear. Also changes it to clothing.
descriptionHtml:
This mod modifies all of Miraak's Armour. I wouldn't say it is ''improved'' because I did remove the armor rating.

Robes: All spells cost 25% less magicka, magicka regen +150%, 50% spell and breath absorbtion
Gloves: +50 Magicka, +20 Alchemy, +20 Enchanting
Boots +50 Carry weight, +15% Fire, Frost and Shock resist
Mask: +100 magicka, shout regen time reduced 25%

Some may find this overpowered... Well so do I! But I feel that it should be because after all, you have to slay the first dragonborn to get it.
author: Giveitataunderbolt
